name: photoprism
description: PhotoPrism is a self-hosted AI-powered photo organizer that automatically tags and indexes images using machine learning. It supports RAW formats, browsing, search, and has a polished UI for photographers.
features: AI-powered tagging: Automatically classify and tag photos using machine learning for objects, scenes, and faces.
RAW format support: Process and display RAW files from professional cameras with embedded preview generation.
Facial recognition: Identify and group photos by people with automatic face detection and clustering.
Geolocation mapping: View photos on interactive maps based on GPS metadata and organize by location.
Duplicate detection: Automatically identify and manage duplicate photos to save storage space.
Album organization: Create albums and collections to organize photos beyond folder structures.
Advanced search: Find photos using natural language queries combining tags, dates, locations, and metadata.
Mobile apps: Access your library from iOS and Android devices with native mobile applications.
Video support: Index and play video files alongside photos with thumbnail generation and metadata extraction.
Privacy controls: Share albums with customizable access controls and password protection.
Metadata editing: Modify EXIF data, titles, descriptions, and tags directly in the interface.
Import automation: Automatically organize and index new photos added to watched directories.
